page.title: 08Calne Sports Centre
page.content:
The sports centre offers several activites including five-aside football,netball,volleyball,judo and swimming.
Their prices are very reasonable but non-members have to pay more than members.To join it costs a{family {Â£9.00}a year and a single{adult Â£5.50.
During the autumn special courses are aranged such as archery, gymnastics, trampolining and swimming for beginners. The centre also provides equipment for sale or hire.
A survey of 76 pupils at school showed { 41%}used the centre at least once a week;{17%}once a month;{33% occasionally and{9%}never used the centre.
